chat.msg: Hello Sean, I am very upset due to a bug in our software. It has been making our systems crash and I’m not sure how to fix it. I’m very frustrated because it has taken 3 hours for someone from Support to respond.

We tried everything that your company suggested on the help page. I'm afraid that none of them even came close to solving the issue. It is upsetting to hear that other customers take priority over us.

Hello Sean, I am very upset due to a bug in our software. It has been making our systems crash and I’m not sure how to fix it. I’m very frustrated because it has taken 3 hours for someone from Support to respond.
What have you tried to fix the issue? We have been busy with other customers which is why it took so long
i hate you so much thanks for nothing dumb person
